document_data.name: Hall of Victories
document_data.georefs: {{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|37|4}}{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|149|16}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Victories''' was a room in [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.Description: The room was close to a zone controlling passage between the Hall of Justice and the rest of the castle, much like [[Queen Alvandira's bower]].
document_data.History:
During the originally intended date of the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, [[Glathra Barcantle]] ordered the room to the Hall of Victories closed to keep away deadly, magically transported smoke, originating in the [[Castle Obarskyr/Hall of Justice|Hall of Justice]].

After the massacre of the Council in the following day, a [[War Wizard]] named [[Baern Harbrow]] was guarding the Hall of Victories at the time in which Glathra had an altercation with [[Storm Silverhand]], the Marchioness [[Immerdusk]]. Baern Harbrow had just had an altercation of his own with [[Arclath Delcastle]], a nobleman.
